function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases through the reuse of materials and prefabricated components in construction","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The construction industry delivering adaptable buildings in record time may lead to a higher risk of disease transmission due to the presence of multiple workers in a confined space.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Refurbishment and renovation activities in the built environment can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if proper hygiene and sanitation measures are not implemented.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wasteful practices and inadequate sanitation in the food sector contribute to the risk of disease transmission and foodborne illnesses, impacting public health.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased proximity of agricultural activities to urban areas may increase the risk of disease transmission from animals to humans.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased popularity of local farms and urban agriculture due to covid-19 may lead to higher levels of contamination in these settings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Expansion of food collection, redistribution, and valorisation facilities may lead to an increased risk of disease transmission in these facilities.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of investment in physical infrastructure like cold chains for food storage, processing, and supply","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on the transport sector","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate waste food collection and volarisation infrastructure","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Traffic congestion and increased vehicle use","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient governance mechanism for ce-related initiatives","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Coupling of environmentally efficient vehicles and technical solutions may lead to increased urban mobility and transportation activities, potentially facilitating the spread of contagious diseases in densely populated areas.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ramping up the uptake of low emission vehicles and constructing more electric car charging points may increase human interactions within urban environments, potentially contributing to the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Facilitating a step change towards sustainable improvements in air quality may lead to increased construction activities, potentially causing airborne particle pollution and respiratory health risks for urban residents.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in scaling up battery value chain","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risks of raw material supplies","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased traffic volume and raw material demand from electric vehicles","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper implementation of digital technologies","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Security vulnerabilities in digital infrastructure","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data privacy and compliance with regulations","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of education, information, and awareness integration into educational curricula may hinder adoption of ce principles and lifecycle systems thinking","category":"Educational risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate platforms for collaboration and public-private partnerships may impede the sharing of information and hinder breakthroughs in materials science and engineering","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of sustainability initiatives in public procurement and infrastructure may lead to continued reliance on non-sustainable practices","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unrestricted air travel contributing to the spread of pandemics, such as viral influenza types like covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Environmental pollution and transportation/industrialization contributing to critical issues highlighted by the pandemic.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Non-resilience of peer-to-peer p2p or sharing economy models to global systemic shocks.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in cargo shipping leading to increased airfreight costs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Remote working and telemedicine becoming more prevalent","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in primary energy consumption due to economic slowdown","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate healthcare delivery systems for mass casualties and emergencies","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Protectionism and inward-looking policies on exports and tariff reductions/waivers","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in infectious hospital waste due to the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase in online purchasing leading to reduced foot traffic in small businesses, impacting their viability","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate adoption of regenerative agriculture and urban agriculture leading to food insecurity","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of global value chains due to exploitation of the pandemic for sustainable growth by certain countries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underutilization of offices and commercial spaces during lockdown leading to ventilation issues and increased energy consumption.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased use of modular construction techniques leading to potential gaps and spaces for disease transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Renovation and refurbishment of existing buildings without considering circularity and sustainability principles.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive national-level policies for circular economy ce leading to inefficient resource use and waste management.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unsustainable focus on business competitiveness and profitability over general well-being","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Barriers to implementing circular economy principles","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Socio-cultural considerations and operational challenges","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High potential for disease transmission in crowded health club facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance leading to unsanitary conditions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with health and safety regulations","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in health club facilities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruptions caused by covid-19 impact’s anonymity","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of sustainable management of facility functions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"International collaboration and control toward preserving public health may be insufficient or ineffective","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
